admission_text:
# Plan Your Visit

Welcome to the Evansville Museum of Arts, History & Science. We utilize our permanent collection and resources to offer diverse educational experiences for the Tri-State region. Evansville Museum offers exhibitions, educational events, family programs and more. Visit us along the Ohio Riverfront in the heart of downtown Evansville, Indiana.

## Admission

Adults (Ages 18 & Up)

$14

Youth (Ages 4 - 17)

$9

Children 3 & Under

Free

Members

Free

[Buy Tickets](https://www.gatemastertickets.com/store/SearchEventDaySpan.aspx?selected=1171%2c1225&CompanyID=GM232)

Members, please contact the Receptionist during business hours at 812-425-2406 or [htitzer@emuseum.org](http://htitzer@emuseum.org) for an online discount code. Not a member yet? [Become a member](/membership) today!

One [Koch Immersive Theater & Planetarium](/koch-immersive-theater) show is included with regularly priced Museum admission. You can redeem your theater ticket at the front desk upon arriving at the museum.

**Online ticket sales are non-refundable.**

## Free Fridays

On the first Friday of each month, the Museum offers free gallery and EMTRAC admission from 11am - 5pm.

## General Information
